about.description: IIT Bombay is recognized for its excellence in technical education and research, fostering innovation and leadership in science and technology. It has a diverse student body and a vibrant campus life.
about.history: Founded in 1958, IIT Bombay was the second IIT established in India and has played a critical role in shaping the nation's scientific and technical landscape.

programs.name: B.Tech in Computer Science
programs.description: This undergraduate program offers deep insights into computer systems, software development, and algorithms.

programs.name: M.Tech in Data Science
programs.description: This course is aimed at equipping students with skills in data processing, machine learning, and statistical analysis.

admissions.process: Candidates must qualify for the JEE Advanced exam for undergraduate programs and GATE for postgraduate admissions.
admissions.deadlines: Undergraduate admission deadlines are typically in May.
admissions.criteria: Minimum of 75% in Class 12 exams or equivalent, along with JEE/GATE scores.

campusLife.hostels: 15 hostels, each with sports and cultural facilities

scholarships.name: Merit-cum-Means Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Based on academic performance and financial need.

scholarships.name: Institute Free Studentship
scholarships.eligibility: Awarded to students from low-income families.

name: Indian Institute of Technology Delhi
about: IIT Delhi is one of the premier institutes of India, known for its cutting-edge research and innovative academic programs. It plays a critical role in building a foundation for India's scientific and technological progress.

programs.name: B.Tech in Electrical Engineering
programs.description: A comprehensive course focused on power systems, electronics, and telecommunications.

programs.name: M.Tech in Biotechnology
programs.description: An interdisciplinary program blending biology and technology to innovate in healthcare and industry.

admissions.process: Admission through JEE Advanced for undergraduates and GATE for postgraduates.
admissions.deadlines: The undergraduate application closes in May.

name: Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur
about: IIT Kharagpur, the first of the IITs, is known for its extensive campus and diverse course offerings. It has played a pivotal role in shaping India's higher technical education landscape.

programs.name: B.Tech in Aerospace Engineering
programs.description: A specialized course covering aircraft and spacecraft design, aerodynamics, and propulsion.

admissions.process: Admission via JEE Advanced and GATE for undergraduate and postgraduate programs, respectively.
admissions.deadlines: Applications for undergraduate courses close in May.

name: Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur
about: IIT Kanpur is renowned for its strong focus on science and engineering disciplines, with modern facilities and a strong research ecosystem.

programs.name: B.Tech in Chemical Engineering
programs.description: This program covers chemical reactions, process engineering, and materials science.

admissions.process: Entry is based on JEE Advanced for undergraduates and GATE for postgraduates.
admissions.deadlines: Applications close in May for undergraduates.

name: National University of Singapore
about: The National University of Singapore is a leading global university located in the heart of Asia, known for its high-quality research and strong academic reputation.

programs.name: Bachelor of Computing in Computer Science
programs.description: A globally recognized program with a focus on advanced computer systems, AI, and software development.

admissions.process: Admission is based on academic merit and standardized tests such as SAT, ACT, or IB.
admissions.deadlines: Undergraduate application deadlines are in March.
